extensionDescription.message: automatically switches between the open tabs of the current browser window after a certain amount of time.

extensionHomepage.description: The support homepage of the extension. //Dear translators: this web page only exists in English and German, so choose the one which best suited for your translation (most likely English)

settings.description: the settings heading on the options page.

startRotating.description: Tooltip for button when Tab Rotator is inactive.

stopRotating.description: Tooltip for button when Tab Rotator is active.

settingsRotationTime.description: section heading for the rotation time setting in the options page

settingsRotationTimeDescription.message: The amount of time each tab is shown in full seconds
settingsRotationTimeDescription.description: description for the rotation time setting in the options page

settingsRotationTimeWarning.message: The rotation time has to be a positive integer number.
settingsRotationTimeWarning.description: warning notice for the rotation time setting in the options page

settingsReloadTab.description: section heading for the reload tab setting in the options page

settingsReloadTabDescription.message: Reload the current tab, after it has been displayed.
settingsReloadTabDescription.description: description for the reload tab setting in the options page

settingsStartRunning.description: section heading for the start running setting in the options page

settingsStartRunningDescription.message: Start Tab Rotator automatically when the browser starts.
settingsStartRunningDescription.description: description for the start running setting in the options page

rotationBehavior.description: Section heading for the rotation behaviour settings in the option page

rotationBehaviorFixed.message: Rotate the tabs only in the initially active window
rotationBehaviorFixed.description: Section heading for the rotation behaviour settings in the option page

rotationBehaviorCurrent.message: Rotate the tabs only in the currently active window
rotationBehaviorCurrent.description: Section heading for the rotation behaviour settings in the option page

rotationBehaviorAll.message: Rotate the tabs in all windows simultaniously
rotationBehaviorAll.description: Section heading for the rotation behaviour settings in the option page

settingsSave.description: label of the button to save the settings
